mapper.select: SELECT rowNum, g.MTNM FROM ( SELECT g.MTNM, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(g.MTNM) DESC) MTRANK FROM groups g WHERE g.MTNM != '0' GROUP BY g.MTNM ) g WHERE rowNum >= ((#{rowNum} - 1) * 9) + 1 AND rowNum <= (#{rowNum} * 9)

insert.if: MERGE INTO MTLIKE USING DUAL ON (mtNum = #{mntilistno} AND userId = #{userId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET likeYN = #{likeYN}, createdAT = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (mtNum, userId, likeYN, createdAT) VALUES (#{mntilistno},#{userId},#{likeYN},sysdate)
UPDATE mtLike SET mtNum = #{mntilistno}, userId = #{userId}, likeYn = #{likeYN}, createdAt = sysdate WHERE mtNum = #{mntilistno} AND userId = #{userId}
